item.title: Billy Joel sells part of Long Island estate: A 5,500-square-foot gatehouse on 5 beachfront acres for $8.5 million
item.description: To call it a gatehouse might be an understatement: This property has two kitchens, a pool and an extra apartment.

item.title: I viewed a $600K house. I discovered it has an unsafe kitchen extension. Do I tell the selling agent?
item.description: “The next-door neighbor was going to buy it, but the seller warned him off.”
